exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x : List) (a b : A), Descl (Cons b (x ++ Cons a Nil)) -> clos_trans A leA a b" on hypothesis of type "ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil)".

tactic: apply Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind with (a:=a) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable a (possible names are: A, leA, P, l and l0).

original: intros a b x H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply desc_tail in H2. apply Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind with (a:=a) in H2; auto.
